name: Medusa's Labyrinth VR
description: Medusaâ€™s Labyrinth is a mythological first person horror game set in ancient Greece. It takes myths and legends that have stayed with us for over 2000 years and mix them together in a game that blends horror with stealth into a unique and intense horror experience. Now all this can be seen in VR for the first time!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 (or equivalent) Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 (or equivalent) DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4096 MB available space
